# YOUR CODE HERE

N, T, A = map(int, input().split())

# If T is strictly greater than N//2, Takahashi has already won
# If A is strictly greater than N//2, Aoki has already won
# Otherwise, the outcome is not decided yet
if T > N//2:
    print("Yes")
elif A > N//2:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
